evidence.heading: BACKGROUND
evidence.snippet: The Parties are entering into this Agreement to establish the terms and conditions under which Seller may agree to sell specific products to Buyer, and Buyer may agree to purchase specific products from Seller

evidence.heading: Source: REYNOLDS CONSUMER PRODUCTS INC., S-1, 11/15/2019
evidence.snippet: constitutes the entire agreement between the Parties with respect to the sale of products by Seller to Buyer and the purchase of products by Buyer from Seller.

evidence.heading: MASTER SUPPLY AGREEMENT
evidence.snippet: MASTER SUPPLY AGREEMENT (the "Agreement") dated November 1, 2019 (the "Effective Date")

evidence.heading: AGREEMENT
evidence.snippet:
1. Term. The "Term" of this Agreement will commence on the Effective Date and will end on
the earlier of: (a) the first anniversary of the expiration date of the last Purchase

This Agreement and all claims or causes of action arising out of or related to this Agreement shall be governed in all respects... by the laws of the State of Illinois and the United States of America

evidence.heading: Schedule (as defined in this next Section); (b) a termination date elected by a Party in a
evidence.snippet: "written notice delivered to the other Party any time after the expiration of the last Purchase Schedule"

evidence.heading: Source: REYNOLDS CONSUMER PRODUCTS INC., S-1, 11/15/2019
evidence.snippet: Automobile Liability Insurance. Occurrence based coverage with a combined single limit of at least $10,000,000 per occurrence and in the aggregate

evidence.heading: Source: REYNOLDS CONSUMER PRODUCTS INC., S-1, 11/15/2019
evidence.snippet: 7. Indemnification. a. A claim that a Party ... is required to defend and indemnify the other Party ... is referred to ... as an "Indemnified Claim".

issues: Field 'liability_cap' must be a non-empty string

evidence.snippet: A Party will promptly notify the other Party of any change in circumstance during the Term in which the Party is no longer in compliance with the foregoing general representations, warranties and covenants.

If a Buyer receives a product that fails to conform to these representations and warranties, the sole remedies of Buyer for the breach of warranty will be to: (1) reject and return the non-conforming product...

This Agreement and all claims or causes of action arising out of or related to this Agreement shall be governed in all respects... by the laws of the State of Illinois and the United States of America

evidence.heading: Source: REYNOLDS CONSUMER PRODUCTS INC., S-1, 11/15/2019
evidence.snippet: The restrictions in this Section will not preclude a Party for authorizing an Affiliate to purchase or sell a product on behalf of a Party under this Agreement.

evidence.snippet: Employers' Liability Insurance... limit of at least $10,000,000 per occurrence... Requires waiver of alternate employer endorsement.
